sentences.en: Because of this, he says, children learning English "need someone to show them the letters, teach them the letter sounds, play with letter magnets on the fridge.
sentences.cn: 因此，他说，儿童学习英语“需要有人给他们看这些字母，教他们字母的读音，与他们玩贴在冰箱上的磁铁字母。”

sentences.en: Defrost the fridge regularly so that it works at maximum efficiency.
sentences.cn: 定期给冰箱除霜，以便它能发挥其最高效率。

sentences.en: Eggs shouldn't be kept in the fridge, it's too cold.
sentences.cn: 鸡蛋不应保存在冰箱里，温度太低了。

sentences.en: He took a can of beer from the fridge.
sentences.cn: 他从冰箱里取出一罐啤酒。

sentences.en: He went straight through to the kitchen and took a can of beer from the fridge.
sentences.cn: 他径直来到厨房，从冰箱里取出一罐啤酒。

sentences.en: His fridge was bare apart from three very withered tomatoes.
sentences.cn: 他的冰箱里除了3个非常干瘪的西红柿外已经空空如也。

sentences.en: I emptied the contents of the fridge into carrier bags.
sentences.cn: 我把冰箱里的东西全都腾到手提袋里。

sentences.en: I put the milk and meat in the fridge.
sentences.cn: 我把牛奶和肉放在冰箱里.

sentences.en: I want this beer to chill so I'll leave it in the fridge for an hour.
sentences.cn: 我想要啤酒变凉，因此我把它放在冰箱里一小时。

sentences.en: If you like fish but hate the smell, soak your fish in water and baking soda for an hour in the  fridge.
sentences.cn: 如果你爱吃鱼但又不喜欢那惺味的话，不妨将鱼浸泡在小苏打水里然后在冰箱里放上一小时。

sentences.en: It can be anything: spoiled milk from the back of your fridge right down to tar and feathers.
sentences.cn: 它可以是任何玩意儿：从你冰箱后面那些变质的牛奶到沥青和羽毛。

sentences.en: Keep what's left in a covered container in the fridge.
sentences.cn: 把剩下的食物装入带盖的容器，放进冰箱。

sentences.en: No, but a fridge and a stove.
sentences.cn: 没有，但有一台冰箱和一个电炉。

sentences.en: Put it somewhere like on your cupboard or fridge so you see it every day.
sentences.cn: 把它放在诸如你的碗柜或冰箱上，这样你每天都能够看到它了。

sentences.en: She made her way to the kitchen to raid the fridge.
sentences.cn: 她走向厨房去扫荡冰箱。

sentences.en: Sunday mornings my mother would bake. I'd stand by the fridge and help.
sentences.cn: 星期天早晨，妈妈会烤面包，我就站在冰箱旁帮忙。

sentences.en: The brown mush in the fridge is some veg soup left over.
sentences.cn: 冰箱里的棕色糊状东西是一些剩的蔬菜汤。

sentences.en: The fridge door was open and food was scattered across the floor.
sentences.cn: 冰箱门开着，食物散落在地板上。

sentences.en: The fridge was carefully stocked up with food.
sentences.cn: 冰箱里周到地放满了食品.

sentences.en: The fridge was stocked with food and drink. ＃
sentences.cn: 冰箱里装满了食物和饮料。

sentences.en: Then all three of you sign the contract and post in on the fridge.
sentences.cn: 然后你们三个人要都在协议上签名，并把它贴在冰箱上。

sentences.en: There was an impressive array of pill bottles stacked on top of the fridge.
sentences.cn: 冰箱上显眼地摆放着许多药瓶。

sentences.en: This dessert can be served straight from the fridge.
sentences.cn: 这种甜食从冰箱里拿出来就可以吃。
